feed.title: KrakenD Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.8.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Otel add backend and endpoint static attrs by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/938
  • upgrade to latest krakend-lua version by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/937
  • remove setting go version variable at link time by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/929
  • Bump version to 2.8.0 by @taik0 in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/943

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.7.2...v2.8.0

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix race warnings by @thedae in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/947
  • Fix build by @thedae in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/956
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.32.0 to 0.33.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/958
  • New methods to lint the config file by @thedae in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/954
  • Bump krakend-lua to v2.6.1 by @thedae
  • Integration of global param propagation for sequential merger by @thedae in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/960
  • Bump v2.9.0 by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/963
  • Update Go to 1.22.11 and Alpine to 3.21

New Contributors

  • @thedae made their first contribution in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/947

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.8.0...v2.9.0

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.9.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • update to fixed branch of krakend-otel for nil tracer by @dhontecillas in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/964

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.9.0...v2.9.1

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump github.com/go-jose/go-jose/v4 from 4.0.4 to 4.0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/974
  • Bump github.com/go-jose/go-jose/v3 from 3.0.3 to 3.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/975

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.9.1...v2.9.2

entry.title: New release for KrakenD: v2.9.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • upgrade old ubuntu versions and use the same in all workflow steps by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/969
  • bump v2.9.3 by @kpacha in https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/pull/979

Full Changelog: https://github.com/krakend/krakend-ce/compare/v2.9.2...v2.9.3
